resources.string: Equations with positive roots. Root range: [1, 10]
Equations with senior coefficient. Root range: [-10, 10], senior coeff range: [-3, 3]
Huge equations. Root range: [-20, 20], senior coeff range: [-5, 5]
Reduced equations with positive roots but huge numbers. Root range: [1, 30]
Reduced equations with positive and negative roots but huge numbers. Root range: [-30, 30]
Classic equation with positive roots but huge senior coeff. Root range: [1, 10], senior coeff range: [-10, 10]
Classic equation but huge senior coeff. Root and senior coeff range: [-10, 10]
